text: Ra jaba hamile bani isra'ilasita vaca garayaum ki allaha baheka aru kasaiko puja nagarnu, ra amaâ€“babusita ramro vyavahara garnu yastai natedara, anatha ra garibaharusanga pani, ra manisaharusanga ramra kura garnu, ra namaja padhdai garnu, ra jakata (dana) dindai garnu. Tara kehi vyaktiharu baheka timi (sabai) yasa vacanabata pachi pharkayau ra mukha pheryau
